Model has been forwarded to Ed Merk and he suggested the following change:

### Eclipse Workspace Patch 1.0
#P org.eclipse.emf.importer.java
Index: src/org/eclipse/emf/importer/java/builder/JavaEcoreBuilder.java
===================================================================
RCS file:
/cvsroot/modeling/org.eclipse.emf/org.eclipse.emf/plugins/org.eclipse.emf.importer.java/src/org/eclipse/emf/importer/java/builder/JavaEcoreBuilder.java,v
retrieving revision 1.40
diff -u -r1.40 JavaEcoreBuilder.java
--- src/org/eclipse/emf/importer/java/builder/JavaEcoreBuilder.java     15
Jun 2007 21:20:58 -0000 1.40
+++ src/org/eclipse/emf/importer/java/builder/JavaEcoreBuilder.java     26
Jul 2007 21:21:41 -0000
@@ -1345,6 +1345,7 @@
           if (existingEPackage != null)
           {

ePackage.getEClassifiers().addAll(existingEPackage.getEClassifiers());
+
ePackage.getEAnnotations().addAll(existingEPackage.getEAnnotations());
           }

           packageNameToEPackageMap.put(qualifiedPackageName, ePackage);




More information:
The fix has been committed to CVS.
